name: A.D. 1656
description:
Game was created for GameJam: https://gamejam.polskigamedev.pl

A game set in the realities of the 'Swedish Deluge' The Polish-Sweden war in the XVII century. We play the role of a young nobleman who manages the village in the name of his father who went to war. Involved in various schemes of the villagers. The mechanics of the game, however, is based only on the memories of these events, due to problems with the implementation of a number of quests that make this game an RPG.
